name: ASTERONAUT
description:
The Intergalactic Federation of Space Exploration has selected you, subject 2145845, to explore the caves of asteroid ZYKAL185B! What an opportunity for you!  

Your mission: to collect as much mineral resources as possible for our scientific friends! For this first expedition you focus on gold ores, these gold ores are your number one priority, don't forget any of them! REALLY!

Scroll Wheel to manage the power of your JetPack
Right Click to activate your JetPack
Left Click to Shoot

You have to catch the five gold ores by shooting on them
